column2: "Hm, well, here's your reward. I really appreciate it, thanks."
"Once again, there was another mass invasion of Darkers on Naberius. Plus, what was with that big Darker...?"
"...it seems like something's up. Maybe I should see what I can do a bit, eh?"
"If needed, I'll give you a shout again. Well, I'll be counting on you."
